resources.string:
In this app titled "To do list" you can add you task associated with date when this task is going to be completed so that you never forget your task. "

" In this , You can "DELETE" the task as well ,To delete you have to press "SHOW button" and then long presses the task you want to be delete and then prompt a alert"Ask you to delete " , then finally click "YES" delete."

" And make sure you have INTERNET connection because your task are stored on online server.

Hey!"
" This is developed by me "

"Hemant Prakash Sood "

"and this is my very first android application "

"If you have any doubt, query , suggestion etc.. "

"You can contact me using this mail
